question: Container securityContext dropping all capabilities and readOnlyRootFilesystem.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  containers:
  - name: busybox
    image: busybox
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 3600
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
